column4: I'm trying to debug a sound problem. My first course of action is trying to stop pulseaudio to see if the problem might be there (or in its dependencies). How do i do it? killall pulseaudio or killall -9 pulseaudio doesn't work. Are there some process around that automatically respawns it?
pulseaudio -k doesn't work either, neither does /etc/init.d/pulseaudio force-quit
